thread.section_title: CurrentBody.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.currentbody.com
thread.title: Eunice

author: Eunice
title: Eunice
text: I wanted to buy an item under the most wierd conditions because currently I'm not living in my home country but I'm still using credit cards from there. The most lovely girl, Louise, she helped me for more than an hour in the chat and two abroad phone calls in order to complete my purchase. Besides, I needed the order would be shipped the same day and she also got sure about that. The best customer service I've ever had, for real.
